title: Preprocess Stage
content:
In the Preprocess Step, Text Capture tool is checking the unmatched brackets in the input files. You can wait for the step to complete, or navigate other pages and resume the task from the Task Manager.
If your task stopped at this stage, you should correct all unmatched brackets to continue your task.

title: How to Correct Unmatched Brackets
content:
Files Information with Unmatched Brackets shows the total number of files with unmatched brackets and how many files have been corrected.
Current File Description shows the name and content of the file as well as the missing brackets in this description.
Unmatched Brackets in This File indicates the content of current description with red marked brackets, and what type and how many missing brackets you need add to this description.

1. Go to Current File Description, add correct brackets at the right position based on the red marked brackets in the description until the unmatched brackets shows 0.
2. Click <<< or >>> to go to other descriptions, correct them as Step 1.
3. Click Next Step in Text Capture unless Files with Unmatched Brackets shows 0.
